import React,{useState,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";/**
 * ExportDropdown component - Dropdown menu for export options (PDF/CSV)
 *
 * @param {Object} props
 * @param {Function} props.onExportPDF - Function to handle PDF export
 * @param {Function} props.onExportCSV - Function to handle CSV export
 * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
 */const ExportDropdown=_ref=>{let{onExportPDF,onExportCSV,className=''}=_ref;const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const dropdownRef=useRef(null);// Close on click outside
useEffect(()=>{const handleClickOutside=event=>{if(dropdownRef.current&&!dropdownRef.current.contains(event.target)){setIsOpen(false);}};if(isOpen){document.addEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);}return()=>{document.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);};},[isOpen]);const handleExportClick=exportType=>{if(exportType==='pdf'&&onExportPDF){onExportPDF();}else if(exportType==='csv'&&onExportCSV){onExportCSV();}setIsOpen(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:dropdownRef,className:"relative dropdown-container ".concat(className),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"button",className:"bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors flex items-center space-x-2",onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();setIsOpen(!isOpen);},"aria-label":"Opciones de exportaci\xF3n","aria-expanded":isOpen,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-download"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Exportar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-chevron-down transition-transform ".concat(isOpen?'rotate-180':'')})]}),isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"absolute right-0 mt-2 w-48 bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg shadow-lg z-10 animate-fadeIn overflow-hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"button",onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();handleExportClick('pdf');},className:"w-full text-left px-4 py-3 text-sm transition-colors cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50 flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-file-pdf mr-3 text-red-600"}),"Exportar como PDF"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"button",onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();handleExportClick('csv');},className:"w-full text-left px-4 py-3 text-sm transition-colors cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50 flex items-center border-t border-gray-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-file-csv mr-3 text-green-600"}),"Exportar como CSV"]})]})]});};export default ExportDropdown;
